s: The colonists is a strategy and development game on an epic scale that you can adapt to your personal taste. The game takes place over several years and multiple eras, as players try to grow their settlement into the largest and most valuable in all the land.
Strangers from all walks of life come together in a simulated post-apocalyptic environment to see if they can survive and rebuild.
